verses.verse: The <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H8055>joy<s%> in your <S%H5797>strength<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; and in your <S%H3444>salvation<s%> how <S%H3966>greatly<s%> shall he <S%H1523>rejoice<s%>!
You have <S%H5414>given<s%> him his <S%H3820>heart<s%>'s <S%H8378>desire<s%>, and have not <S%H4513>withheld<s%> the <S%H782>request<s%> of his <S%H8193>lips<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
For you <S%H6923>meet<s%> him with the <S%H1293>blessings<s%> of <S%H2896>goodness<s%>: you <S%H7896>set<s%> a <S%H5850>crown<s%> of pure <S%H6337>gold<s%> on his <S%H7218>head<s%>.
He <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H2416>life<s%> of <S%H5414>you<s%>, and you gave it <S%H753>him<s%>, even length of <S%H3117>days<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever<s%>.
His <S%H3519>glory<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> in your <S%H3444>salvation<s%>: <S%H1935>honor<s%> and <S%H1926>majesty<s%> have you laid upon <S%H7737>him<s%>.
For you have <S%H7896>made<s%> him most <S%H1293>blessed<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%>: you have <S%H2302>made<s%> him exceedingly <S%H8057>glad<s%> with your <S%H6440>favor<s%>.
For the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H982>trusts<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and through the <S%H2617>mercy<s%> of the most <S%H5945>High<s%> he shall not be <S%H4131>moved<s%>.
Your <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall find <S%H4672>out<s%> all your <S%H341>enemies<s%>: your right <S%H3225>hand<s%> shall find <S%H4672>out<s%> those that hate <S%H8130>you<s%>.

You shall <S%H7896>make<s%> them as a <S%H784>fiery<s%> <S%H8574>oven<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of your <S%H6440>anger<s%>: the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall swallow them <S%H1104>up<s%> in his <S%H639>wrath<s%>, and the <S%H784>fire<s%> shall devour <S%H398>them<s%>.
Their <S%H6529>fruit<s%> shall you <S%H6>destroy<s%> from the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and their <S%H2233>seed<s%> from among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>.
For they <S%H5186>intended<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> against <S%H2803>you<s%>: they imagined a mischievous <S%H4209>device<s%>, which they are not able to <S%H3201>perform<s%>.
Therefore shall you <S%H7896>make<s%> them turn their <S%H7926>back<s%>, when you shall make <S%H3559>ready<s%> your arrows upon your <S%H4340>strings<s%> against the face of <S%H6440>them<s%>.
Be you <S%H7311>exalted<s%>, <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, in your own <S%H5797>strength<s%>: so will we <S%H7891>sing<s%> and <S%H2167>praise<s%> your <S%H1369>power<s%>.
